translation.en: [Sara] Girls today can be anything.
translation.fr: De nos jours, une fille peut tout faire.

translation.en: CEO, Olympic golden medalist,
even a Supreme Court Justice.
translation.fr: même juge à la Cour suprême.

translation.en: We've finally broken that glass ceiling
translation.fr: On a enfin brisé le plafond de verre,

translation.en: and, wow, it sure looks good from the top.
translation.fr: et la vue d'en haut est magnifique.

translation.en: -[giggles] Ah! -[Kenny] Stop!
Hey, go brush your teeth. Wipe her face.
translation.fr:
Va te laver les dents.
Essuie-lui le visage.

translation.en: Did you find your homework? And you, my little friend, you need pants.
translation.fr:
Tu as retrouvé ton exposé ?
Ma puce, tu as oublié ton pantalon.

translation.en: Mom, can I stay home from school today?
translation.fr: Je peux rester à la maison aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: Nobody's staying home.
translation.fr: Personne ne reste à la maison.

translation.en: -I feel sick. -What hurts?
translation.fr:
- Je suis malade.
- Tu as mal où ?

translation.en: My spleen.
Specificity is good, but that's over the top.
translation.fr:
C'est bien d'être précis,
mais pas à ce point.

translation.en: Next time, try tummy.
It's go time. Let's go.
Okay, everyone's going to school. Mommy has something important to do.
translation.fr:
Vous allez tous à l'école.
Maman a quelque chose à faire.

translation.en: [Amber] Oh, look.
[Kenny] Guys, look. Daddy's on TV again.
translation.fr: Papa passe encore à la télé.

translation.en: So what are you waiting for? A pig to fly?
translation.fr:
Alors, qu'attendez-vous ?
Que les cochons aient des ailes ? LES MOTEURS BOLAND
TOUT LE MONDE LES AIME !

translation.en: All right, let's go. Line up. Train's a-leavin'.
translation.fr: Bon, on décolle. C'est parti, mon kiki.

translation.en: -Love you. Love you. -Bye.
-Bags in the back. -Love you.
translation.fr:
- Les cartables dans le coffre.
- Je t'aime.

translation.en: Love you.
Love you.
Tuna fish. Keep it in the fridge. [sighs]
translation.fr: C'est du thon. Mets-le au frigo.

translation.en: [Sadie] Stop, stop, stop. Mom.
[Annie] You make your dad drop you off all the way back here?
translation.fr:
Tu demandes à ton père
de te déposer si loin ?

translation.en: I don't know. [chuckles]
What's the girlfriend drive?
Porsche Turbo.
Oh! I'm so sorry. Did you need this?
Love you, Sadie.
Can I have lunch money?
translation.fr: Je peux avoir de l'argent pour manger ?

translation.en: Ugh, come on. Did those kids take it again?
translation.fr:
C'est pas vrai.
Ils t'ont encore rackettée ?

translation.en: God, those douchebags. That was a 20.
translation.fr: Quels petits cons. Un billet de 20.

translation.en: Well, small price to pay for the bone structure of my face.
translation.fr:
C'est pas cher payé
pour éviter qu'on me casse la figure.

translation.en: That's very true.
I don't wanna leave you without cash.
translation.fr: Et toi, il va t'en rester ?

translation.en: Excuse me, who is the adult here?
Don't answer that.
So, why aren't there any of these awesome women in my history book, huh?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi ces femmes extraordinaires
ne sont pas dans mon livre d'histoire ?

translation.en: I'll tell you why.
Sister made the mistake of getting her period.
translation.fr:
Elles ont fait l'erreur
d'avoir leurs règles.

translation.en: They say, "Behind every great man, there's a great woman."
translation.fr:
On dit : "Derrière tout grand homme,
il y a une femme."

translation.en: Well, I say that's some bull right there.
Well, none of these nasty women I just told you about
translation.fr:
Aucune des pouffiasses
dont je viens de vous parler

translation.en: stood behind men.
-[pops lips] -They stood right beside them.
So, we gotta get it done ourselves, ladies.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on se bouge, mesdames.

translation.en: Am I right?
You get it, girl! You get it!
-We're gonna burn this patriarchy down! -Whoo!
Ain't nobody gonna stop her?
[Ruby] Okay, I'm out of here.
What's going on? You got an early shift?
translation.fr: Quoi ? Tu as pris des heures sup' ?

translation.en: I figured, you know, we could use the extra.
translation.fr: Pour mettre du beurre dans les épinards.

translation.en: Mmm, I figured the same thing,
'cause I'm about to pull a double at the mall.
translation.fr:
je vais passer la nuit
au centre commercial.

translation.en: I'll make it work.
-You always do, boo. -I do.
translation.fr:
- Tu y arrives toujours.
- C'est vrai.

translation.en: I cannot believe you.
Chill, sis. I'm, like, two minutes late.
translation.fr:
Relax, sœurette.
J'ai que deux minutes de retard.

translation.en: How was Sara's thing?
Oh, she was so good.
She's so smart. I worry about mine.
translation.fr:
Elle est tellement intelligente.
Les miens m'inquiètent.

translation.en: [chuckles] Stop it.
[sighs] All right, you all ready for this?
-[sighs] -Now or never.
[Ruby] Let's do it.
[Annie] All right! Everybody be cool, and nobody gets hurt!
translation.fr:
Que personne ne bouge,
et tout se passera bien !

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, this is a robbery!
translation.fr:
Mesdames et messieurs,
ceci est un hold-up !

translation.en: -Oh, my lord! -[wax strip ripping]
Maybe we don't have to do the full Brazilian.
translation.fr:
On ne va peut-être pas faire
le maillot brésilien.

translation.en: Oh, a Brazilian would put you in the hospital. This is just brush control.
translation.fr:
Ça vous enverrai à l'hosto.
Là, je débroussaille juste.

translation.en: Yeah, I probably don't get in here as much as I used to.
translation.fr:
Oui, j'ai un peu négligé l'entretien,
ces derniers temps.

translation.en: [sarcastically] No.
My husband and I aren't having a lot of S-E-X right now.
translation.fr:
En ce moment,
on fait rarement l'amour avec mon mari.

translation.en: Maybe he just can't find it.
translation.fr: Il ne trouve peut-être pas l'entrée.

translation.en: [sighs] Kids are back to school. I'm swamped. He's always working late.
translation.fr:
Les enfants ont cours,
je suis débordée, il travaille tard.

translation.en: Plus, there's so much on the DVR.
translation.fr: Et on a plein de séries à rattraper.

translation.en: It's really kind of hard to schedule--
Mrs. Boland? Your card was declined.
translation.fr: Mme Boland ? Votre carte a été rejetée.

translation.en: Are you sure?
I ran it twice.
I'm sure he just forgot to pay the bill. He's been very distracted lately.
translation.fr:
Il a dû oublier de payer la facture.
Il a la tête ailleurs, dernièrement.

translation.en: Hey, there. Amber here, over at Boland Motors.
translation.fr: Salut. Ici Amber, des Moteurs Boland. LE MEILLEUR GARAGE DE DÉTROIT

translation.en: We've got Chevys. We've got Fords. We've got Chryslers, too.
translation.fr:
On a des Chevrolet. On a des Ford.
On a même des Chrysler.

translation.en: Have we got the car for you?
translation.fr:
Est-ce qu'on a
la voiture qu'il vous faut ?

translation.en: Do you think I could make it in LA?
translation.fr: Tu penses que je pourrais réussir à LA ?

translation.en: It's not like Michigan. They have really good actresses there.
translation.fr:
C'est pas le Michigan.
Il y a de très bonnes actrices, là-bas.

translation.en: You're gonna win one of those fancy awards.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais remporter un prix prestigieux.

translation.en: Like a People's Choice.
translation.fr: Comme le Grand Prix du Public.

translation.en: I don't need all that. I just wanna be super famous.
translation.fr:
Je m'en fiche de ça.
Je veux juste être ultra-célèbre.

translation.en: So, come on down to Boland Motors,
where we'll put the vroom, vroom, vroom back in your engine.
translation.fr: vous aurez du vroum-vroum sous le capot.

translation.en: Annie Bananie. Hey, you, uh, you got any plans later?
translation.fr:
Annie, ma jolie !
Quelque chose de prévu, après le boulot ?

translation.en: My church is having a "bring a friend" night.
translation.fr:
C'est la soirée "invitez un ami"
dans ma paroisse.

translation.en: You know, I'm just not really much of a church person.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas très pratiquante.

translation.en: You're definitely a stuck-up bitch.
translation.fr: Tu es juste une connasse mal baisée.

translation.en: I'm just kidding you.
Now, see, the old me totally would have meant that.
But, uh, you know, born-again Boomer don't judge.
translation.fr:
Mais depuis que j'ai retrouvé la foi,
je ne juge pas.

translation.en: This, uh, came from your register last night.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé ça dans ta caisse, hier soir.

translation.en: Know what it is?
Mmm. This is a tough one. It's a curling iron?
translation.fr: Pas évident. Un fer à friser ?

translation.en: We in the biz say "counterfeit."
translation.fr: Dans le milieu, on parle de "faux billet."

translation.en: Now, see, I know it's counterfeit because I use the pen.
translation.fr:
Je sais qu'il est faux,
car je l'ai passé au stylo.

translation.en: Did you use the pen?
Boomer, I don't remember if--
translation.fr: Boomer, je ne me rappelle pas si...

translation.en: I'm guessing you didn't, because if you had,
translation.fr: Je pense que non, car autrement,

translation.en: you would have known it's counterfeit. Which is why we have the pen.
translation.fr:
tu aurais su qu'il était faux.
D'où l'utilité du stylo.

translation.en: So, unfortunately, I'm gonna have to dock this from your paycheck.
translation.fr: Je vais donc le retenir sur ton salaire.

translation.en: Boomer, that's, like, a whole shift for me.
translation.fr:
C'est l'équivalent
d'une journée de boulot.

translation.en: Well, maybe next time you'll take security more seriously.
translation.fr:
La prochaine fois,
tu feras attention à la sécurité.

translation.en: Oh, come on. What security?
Excuse me, how much longer is the wait? 'Cause we've been...
translation.fr:
Pardon, il y a encore beaucoup d'attente ?
Parce qu'on...

translation.en: [doctor] What I'm most concerned about right now is Stella's kidney function.
translation.fr:
Ce qui m'inquiète le plus,
c'est les reins de Stella.

translation.en: Sara.
-What? -You said "Stella." Her name's Sara.
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Elle s'appelle Sara, pas Stella.

translation.en: Okay, so, what about her kidneys?
translation.fr: Et ses reins, ils ont quoi ?

translation.en: [sighs] One is failing. The other one's right behind.
translation.fr:
L'un de ses reins a lâché.
L'autre ne va pas tarder.

translation.en: I would suggest that we put Sara
on a list for a transplant as soon as possible.
translation.fr:
sur la liste des receveurs
dès que possible.

translation.en: Carla, you just can't throw files like this.
translation.fr:
Carla, évite de balancer les dossiers
comme ça.

translation.en: [Carla] We just got ten walk-ins.
-I've been doing some reading. -Okay.
'Cause she can barely make it through the school day right now.
translation.fr:
Elle arrive à peine
à tenir une journée d'école.

translation.en: [doctor] It's all willy-nilly over there.
-She can barely... -Okay? No.
...make it through the day, let alone soccer.
translation.fr:
à tenir une journée,
et je ne parle pas du sport.

translation.en: You might wanna keep her home and get a tutor.
translation.fr:
Elle devrait rester à la maison,
avec un prof particulier.

translation.en: Are those last week's blood draws?
translation.fr:
C'est les résultats
de la semaine dernière ?

translation.en: Well, my husband and I work all the time...
translation.fr: Mon mari et moi travaillons beaucoup.

translation.en: -Here, Carla. -...so we can't.
translation.fr:
- Tiens, Carla.
- On ne peut pas.

translation.en: -And... -[doctor] Take them all away.
And the transplant lists can take months, right?
translation.fr:
Trouver un donneur
peut prendre des mois, non ?

translation.en: [doctor] Separate. Thank you.
-And there's this new drug... -[doctor] Thank you.
translation.fr:
- Et il y a un nouveau médicament...
- Merci.

translation.en: -...that just got approved... -Take everything out.
Oh, my God! Can you please just listen to me for one damn minute?
translation.fr: Vous pouvez m'écouter une minute, bordel ?

translation.en: Shame on you.
Shame on all of you. [crying]
[sighs] Eculizumab.
That's the name of the drug you're talking about?
translation.fr: C'est le médicament dont vous parliez ?

translation.en: -Yes. -It does.
It improves renal function dramatically.
translation.fr:
Il est très efficace
contre l'insuffisance rénale.

translation.en: It's also ten grand a month out of pocket.
translation.fr:
Mais il coûte 10 000 $ par mois,
de votre poche.

translation.en: And I'm guessing that may not be an option.
translation.fr: Je devine que ce n'est pas possible.

translation.en: Well, I'll talk to my husband. We might be able to swing it.
translation.fr:
J'en parlerai à mon mari.
On peut se débrouiller.

translation.en: [Beth] And she was only halfway through my wax.
So, what happened?
Well, now I'm very uneven.
-[Ruby] I don't even wanna know. -[chuckles]
Dean maxed out their credit card at some lingerie store.
translation.fr:
Dean a fait flamber leur carte bleue
dans un magasin de lingerie.

translation.en: Do you think he's sleeping around?
Don't nobody want Dean. It's a Christmas gift.
translation.fr:
Personne ne voudrait de lui.
C'est un cadeau de Noël.

translation.en: [Beth] In October?
Maybe it's your anniversary present.
He already gave me 100 coupons to Bed Bath & Beyond.
translation.fr:
Il m'a déjà offert des bons de réduction
pour de la déco.

translation.en: Ew. Really?
Son of a bitch.
No, I really do love it there.
No. That old guy is stealing your tip.
translation.fr:
Non. Le vieux, là-bas,
il te choure ton pourboire.

translation.en: He can't even walk.
-Go get it. -[Ruby sighs]
Shady SOB.
-Huh? Mmm-hmm. -[Ruby] Shady.
At my old job, we got robbed all the time. So I got the sixth sense now.
translation.fr:
On se faisait souvent braquer, au boulot.
Je les repère, maintenant.

translation.en: Are you serious?
I mean, it's no big deal.
All the stores I work at eventually get hit.
translation.fr: Où que je bosse, il y a un braquage.

translation.en: -You could get shot. -Ugh. One can hope.
translation.fr:
- Et si on te tire dessus ?
- Ça risque pas.

translation.en: These guys, they don't want to hurt anybody.
They just want the money. So we let them have it.
translation.fr:
Ils veulent juste l'argent.
Et on le leur laisse.

translation.en: Nobody's trying to be a hero.
-Do they get caught? -[scoffs] Yeah, the dumb ones do,
translation.fr: Ils se font choper ? Les idiots,

translation.en: 'cause they park in the front by the security cameras.
translation.fr:
ceux qui se garent devant,
sous les caméras de surveillance.

translation.en: You gotta put your getaway car in the back by the loading dock.
translation.fr:
Il faut se garer à l'arrière,
dans la zone de livraison.

translation.en: And you never dick around with the registers.
translation.fr: Et ne pas se faire chier avec la caisse.

translation.en: The real money is back in the vault.
You've really worked this out.
Just keeping my options open.
How much is in the vault?
translation.fr: Il y a combien, dans le coffre-fort ?

translation.en: Thirty grand, give or take.
Damn, I could use that money.
Oh, my God. Me, too.
So, when you wanna do this?
Well, I already bought three automatics and filed off the serial numbers.
translation.fr:
J'ai déjà acheté trois flingues,
j'ai effacé le numéro de série.

translation.en: So, really, name a day.
You should see your face.
It's whiter than usual.
[Annie] I'm gonna need you to all get on the ground.
Get your cell phones out of your pockets and keep your hands where I can see 'em.
translation.fr:
Sortez votre téléphone
et posez les mains sur le sol.

translation.en: All right, good.
Now, I need you to get your manager up here.
I said you need to get a manager up here right now.
translation.fr: J'ai dit, j'aimerais parler au gérant.

translation.en: Hey, where's y'all's boss at?
I better get a manager up here right now or I will start capping people!
translation.fr:
Si le gérant se pointe pas fissa,
je commence à flinguer les gens !

translation.en: I'm not even joking, mother--
-You the manager? -Over there.
Hey. Hey, you. You.
-You, squirmy. Hey. Hey. Hey. -[grunting]
Are you in charge here?
[stammering] Yes. Yes, I am.
[Beth] Okay, then, you listen to me.
You're gonna put on your big boy panties,
translation.fr: Tu vas faire le grand garçon,

translation.en: and you're gonna tell your customers to stay calm,
translation.fr:
tu vas dire aux clients
de garder leur calme,

translation.en: and this will be over real soon.
translation.fr: et tout sera fini en moins de deux.

translation.en: [Annie] Get out of there.
Everybody stay calm, okay?
Now, you're gonna take my friend here to the cash vault.
translation.fr:
Maintenant, accompagne mon amie
au coffre-fort.

translation.en: Move it before I shoot your face off! Let's go!
translation.fr: Grouille-toi, ou je te bute ! Allez !

translation.en: Now! Now! Now!
[sighs] Oh, my God.
[Ruby] Hey, Deadpool, you wanna...
Seriously?
You won't call me back.
translation.fr: Tu réponds pas à mes appels.

translation.en: I was busy.
So, here I am.
Well, I'm pretty sure I'm supposed to be helping customers,
translation.fr: Je suis censée aider les clients,

translation.en: not chatting with my ex. So...
So, now I'm a customer.
Nancy and I are suing you for custody.
translation.fr:
Nancy et moi allons intenter un procès
pour avoir la garde de Sadie.

translation.en: Club card?
There's a hearing next month. You should probably get yourself a lawyer.
translation.fr:
Il y a une audience dans un mois.
Tu devrais te trouver un avocat.

translation.en: You know, if you sign up now, you get ten percent off your purchase.
translation.fr: Avec la carte, tu as 10 % de réduction.

translation.en: Annie, we were 17 when we decided all this stuff.
translation.fr:
Annie, on avait 17 ans
quand on a pris ces décisions.

translation.en: Sadie would be happier with us now.
translation.fr: Sadie serait plus heureuse avec nous.

translation.en: How do you figure, Greg?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui te fait dire ça, Greg ?

translation.en: We could send her to private school. St. Anne's.
translation.fr:
On peut l'envoyer
dans un collège privé, à Sainte-Anne.

translation.en: She's an atheist who enjoys a jaunty bow tie.
translation.fr: Elle est athée et aime les nœuds papillon.

translation.en: I don't really think that Catholic school is a good fit.
translation.fr:
Je doute qu'elle soit à sa place
dans un collège catho.

translation.en: We could get her therapy.
She doesn't need therapy. She's figuring out who she is.
translation.fr:
Elle n'a pas besoin d'un psy.
Elle se cherche.

translation.en: And that's all great, but she's getting bullied, Annie.
translation.fr:
C'est bien beau,
mais elle se fait harceler.

translation.en: Yes, by dickhead kids that need therapy.
translation.fr:
Par des petits merdeux
qui ont besoin d'un psy.

translation.en: Who's watching her now? I mean, it's after midnight.
translation.fr:
Qui la garde, en ce moment ?
Il est minuit passé.

translation.en: The neighborhood girl. She's very good.
translation.fr:
La baby-sitter du quartier.
Elle est extra.

translation.en: The one who got the DUI?
She lives within walking distance.
Buy her a new computer. Hers has been broken for a month.
translation.fr:
Achète-lui un nouvel ordi.
Ça fait un mois que le sien est cassé.

translation.en: Why didn't she tell me that?
translation.fr: Pourquoi elle ne me l'a pas dit ?

translation.en: Because she said she didn't wanna freak you out.
translation.fr: Elle ne voulait pas te stresser.

translation.en: [Annie] Why is it so crazy?
I mean, it's a victimless crime. The store is insured.
translation.fr:
Ça ne fait aucune victime.
Le magasin est assuré.

translation.en: Plus, you know they make us work through lunch?
translation.fr:
Et ils nous font bosser
pendant le déjeuner.

translation.en: So it's basically tit for tat when you figure in the lost wages.
Oh, that will hold up in court.
translation.fr: Essaie de dire ça au tribunal.

translation.en: Hey, no pop before dinner, sweetie.
translation.fr: Pas de soda avant le dîner.

translation.en: But she gets it.
translation.fr: Pourquoi elle y a droit, elle ?

translation.en: That's because I am a grown-up.
translation.fr: Parce que je suis une adulte.

translation.en: Technically.
Okay. You know, can't you just have my back on, like, one thing ever?
translation.fr:
Tu ne peux pas me soutenir,
pour une fois ?

translation.en: This isn't me telling Mom and Dad that you smoked pot.
translation.fr:
C'est pas comme dire aux parents
que tu fumais de la beuh.

translation.en: -[kids laughing] -Which was incredibly lame, by the way.
This is me helping you not ruin your life.
translation.fr:
Je t'empêche juste
de foutre ta vie en l'air.

translation.en: Oh, because your life is so great. I should want this life?
translation.fr:
Et la tienne est tellement mieux.
Je devrais désirer cette vie ?

translation.en: I didn't say that.
You're, like, this Stepford mom without a pulse.
I never said that.
You're cutting chicken fingers into stars. They're already fingers.
translation.fr:
Tu coupes des nuggets en forme d'étoile.
Ils sont déjà coupés.

translation.en: And I mean... not to pile on, but look who you married.
translation.fr:
Et sans vouloir en rajouter,
regarde ton mari.

translation.en: It's 20 years and four children. Marriage sometimes takes a little work.
translation.fr:
20 ans de mariage et quatre enfants.
Parfois, il faut s'accrocher.

translation.en: That is so romantic.
You could lose your daughter. Has that occurred to you?
translation.fr:
Tu pourrais perdre ta fille.
Tu y as pensé ?

translation.en: Well, seeing as Greg is suing me for custody
translation.fr:
Greg me colle un procès
pour avoir la garde de Sadie,

translation.en: and I can't afford to fight it,
translation.fr: et j'ai pas les moyens de me défendre,

translation.en: yes, actually, the thought has crossed my mind.
translation.fr:
alors, oui,
l'idée m'avait traversé l'esprit.

translation.en: I didn't know.
Now you know.
Hey, there. Amber here, over at Boland Motors.
translation.fr: Salut. Ici Amber, des Moteurs Boland. À LA SORTIE DE L'AUTOROUTE I-96

translation.en: Jeez. Who did this chick have to blow to get on TV? [scoffs]
translation.fr:
Qui est-ce qu'elle a sucé
pour passer à la télé, cette cruche ?

translation.en: [Amber] ...around town?
So what are you waiting for? A pig to fly?
translation.fr:
Alors, qu'attendez-vous ?
Que les cochons aient des ailes ?

translation.en: So come on down to Boland Motors,
where we'll put the vroom, vroom, vroom back in your engine.
translation.fr: vous aurez du vroum-vroum sous le capot. VROUM ! VROUM !

translation.en: Is your babysitter free?
Mmm. They took away her license. She's always home.
translation.fr:
On lui a retiré son permis,
elle est toujours dispo.

translation.en: It's this charge here.
Could you just tell me exactly what was bought?
translation.fr:
Pouvez-vous me dire
de quoi il s'agissait ?

translation.en: It's against policy to divulge information on previous purchases.
translation.fr:
Le magasin ne donne aucune information
sur les achats antérieurs.

translation.en: For privacy concerns.
translation.fr:
Par respect
pour la vie privée des clients.

translation.en: Oh, but it's on her bill, so...
translation.fr: C'est sur son relevé bancaire, donc...

translation.en: Then she should remember what she bought.
translation.fr: Elle doit se rappeler ce qu'elle a acheté.

translation.en: Well, I remember that I bought it for a friend.
translation.fr: Je sais que je l'ai acheté pour une amie.

translation.en: And she loved it so much, she really went nuts for it.
translation.fr: Elle a adoré, elle en était folle.

translation.en: But then, she was in an accident.
translation.fr: Mais elle a eu un accident.

translation.en: With a driver. Texting.
translation.fr: Une histoire de texto au volant.

translation.en: It was the other driver texting, not my friend. She'd never do that.
translation.fr:
C'est l'autre qui envoyait un texto,
pas mon amie.

translation.en: But she's been in a coma ever since,
translation.fr: Bref, depuis, elle est dans le coma,

translation.en: and her brain is, like, ten times the size it should be.
translation.fr: et son cerveau a décuplé de taille.

translation.en: Um... I just thought, "Wouldn't it be a nice gesture,
translation.fr: Je pensais que ce serait cool

translation.en: if she wakes up..."
-When she wakes up. Stay positive. -Yeah.
translation.fr: Quand elle se réveillera. Garde espoir.

translation.en: "...to have her favorite pair of undies waiting."
translation.fr: Et qu'elle trouve sa culotte préférée.

translation.en: 'Cause she was wearing the last pair
-when she got in the accident. -Mmm-hmm. Mmm-hmm.
And the paramedics had to cut them off of her.
translation.fr: Les secouristes ont dû la lui enlever.

translation.en: You know, Jaws of Life style.
translation.fr: Avec une pince coupante et tout.

translation.en: Darn it, if I cannot remember the size that I got...
translation.fr:
Mince, si je ne retrouve pas la taille
que j'avais prise...

translation.en: And I obviously feel stupid asking her family.
translation.fr:
Et je ne me vois pas
demander ça à sa famille.

translation.en: -Mmm, can't do that. -So could you just look it up?
translation.fr:
- Pas possible.
- Vous ne pouvez pas vérifier ?

translation.en: Okay, just give me one second, please.
Damn. That was a good sell.
This is so crazy. It'll be something for you.
translation.fr:
T'en fais pas,
c'est forcément un cadeau pour toi.

translation.en: Here it is. This was it?
Okay, yeah, that's probably not for you. [chuckles softly]
translation.fr: Bon, ce n'était pas un cadeau pour toi.

translation.en: [Annie] Okay. It's gonna be okay. We're gonna have a drink. Oof...
translation.fr: Ça va aller. On va boire un verre.

translation.en: We're gonna have ten drinks.
Uh, hey, do you know the difference between a Manhattan and a sidecar?
translation.fr:
Un Manhattan et un Sidecar,
c'est la même chose ?

translation.en: I always forget. Something about vermouth whispering--
translation.fr:
J'oublie toujours.
Il y a une histoire de vermouth...

translation.en: Guess who found caramel bugles at Kroger?
translation.fr: Devinez qui a apporté des caramels ?

translation.en: What is going on? The Bachelorette is on. Hello.
translation.fr:
Que se passe-t-il ?
C'est l'heure de The Bachelorette.

translation.en: [mouthing] Dean's having an affair.
What?
Dean is having an affair.
[mouthing] Dean is...
[normal] Son of a bitch.
Oh, honey. What can we do?
translation.fr:
Ma pauvre.
Qu'est-ce qu'on peut faire pour toi ?

translation.en: How about a screwdriver?
translation.fr:
Tu veux boire un petit coup
pour te retaper ?

translation.en: A sledgehammer.
What?
You planning on stopping this?
Nah. You?
Nah, I'm good.
What is it?
Oh, my God.
Does he have another ho?
[Beth] If you're looking for the vodka, I drank it.
translation.fr: Si tu cherches la vodka, je l'ai bue.

translation.en: [Dean] What are you doing in the dark?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu fais dans le noir ?

translation.en: Guess I'm used to it after 20 years.
translation.fr:
Faut croire qu'après 20 ans,
j'ai l'habitude.

translation.en: What does that mean?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu entends par là ?

translation.en: It means your child bride wears very expensive underwear.
translation.fr: Que ta greluche a des goûts de luxe.

translation.en: What happened to us?
I was stupid.
I was stupid and...
It doesn't even matter.
Why do we have three mortgages that we haven't paid?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi a-t-on
trois hypothèques non payées ?

translation.en: Why do our credit cards all have advances on them
translation.fr:
Pourquoi toutes nos cartes bancaires
sont refusées

translation.en: and we have hardly anything in our accounts?
Look, I made a few bad decisions at work.
translation.fr:
J'ai pris de mauvaises décisions
au boulot.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I tried to fix it with a couple of investments,
translation.fr:
J'ai voulu y remédier
avec des investissements,

translation.en: and I should have been...
I should have been more careful. I panicked.
translation.fr:
J'aurais dû être plus prudent.
J'ai paniqué.

translation.en: We have four children.
I know.
Are we going to lose this house?
translation.fr: Est-ce qu'on va perdre notre maison ?

translation.en: Look, I dropped the ball. That's all.
Are we going to lose the house?
translation.fr: Est-ce qu'on va perdre la maison ?

translation.en: No!
I mean, I don't know.
Maybe.
We might.
We could lose everything.
[crying] I'm so sorry.
We're gonna rob that store.
What?
-We're gonna rob that store. -Yes!
Have you lost your mind?
[Ruby] We were just kidding about the store, Beth.
translation.fr: On disait ça pour rire, Beth.

translation.en: Hey, I wasn't.
-Well, I was. -Why? You need it just as bad as we do.
translation.fr:
- Moi, si.
- Pourquoi ? T'as besoin d'argent aussi.

translation.en: We just do it once. And we get some money.
translation.fr:
Un seul braquage,
pour avoir un peu de fric.

translation.en: Oh, dear God.
[Beth] You can help your little girl.
You can take care of this custody thing.
translation.fr: Tu pourras gérer cette histoire de garde.

translation.en: And I get to save my family. And we're done.
translation.fr:
Et je pourrai sauver ma famille.
C'est tout.

translation.en: We never do it again,
and we don't sit back and let everything be taken away from us.
translation.fr: mais on ne se laisse pas faire.

translation.en: No one's gonna fix this. We have to do this ourselves.
translation.fr:
Personne ne nous aidera.
Il faut le faire nous-mêmes.

translation.en: [Ruby] What is taking so long?
[Beth] I don't know.
-[girl whimpers] -Hi.
How old are you?
Let me guess. Six?
Do you watch Doc McStuffins? [chuckles]
Uh, yeah, we, um, used to... watch it in the Big House.
translation.fr: Oui, on aimait les regarder en taule.

translation.en: -[Annie] Move it, you little weenie! -Ow!
Uh, I'm going as fast as I can.
translation.fr: Je vais aussi vite que je peux.

translation.en: Come on!
Get out of the way!
Stay right there!
[Ruby] Holy crap.
We gotta go. We gotta go! We gotta go!
Oh, shit!
-[Ruby] Let's go! -[Beth] Nope. Turn around!
-Hurry! -[Annie] I got it!
-[Ruby] We gotta go! -[Annie] What?
Gotta go! We've gotta go.
There. Out there. They're going out the back!
Get them!
[Boomer] Get them! Get them!
[Ruby] Beth. Hello?
Are you okay in there? What's your name?
translation.fr: Tout va bien ? Comment tu t'appelles ?

translation.en: I robbed a grocery store.
[Ruby] Who's Secretary of State?
I robbed a grocery store.
Who is Secretary of State?
We robbed a grocery store.
Oh, we totally did.
And we actually got away with it.
Like some smooth criminals.
translation.fr: On est des as du braquage !

translation.en: Uh, how much did we get? Tell me we got the 30.
translation.fr:
Il y en a pour combien ?
Dis-moi qu'on a les 30 000.

translation.en: We got it.
-[both sigh] -Thank you, God.
We got more than the 30 grand.
How much more?
What in the hell?
How is this even possible?
-Count it again. -I counted it right.
Count it again!
You said there would be 30.
translation.fr: Tu as dit qu'il y aurait 30 000.

translation.en: I said, "30, give or take." I guess it was give.
translation.fr:
J'ai dit : "30 000, plus ou moins."
C'était plus.

translation.en: Why does a grocery store even have this kind of money on hand?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi un supermarché
aurait tant de fric ?

translation.en: Because it's hella shady. I told you this was a bad idea.
translation.fr:
C'est de l'argent sale.
Je savais que c'était une mauvaise idée.

translation.en: You guys are missing the point. We just won half a million dollars!
translation.fr:
Vous oubliez le plus important.
On vient de gagner 500 000 $ !

translation.en: -We didn't win anything. -Half a mil, bitches!
translation.fr:
- On n'a rien gagné.
- Un demi-million, mes cocottes !

translation.en: We didn't win it!
We stole it!
And maybe the cops don't follow up on $30,000.
translation.fr:
Et peut-être que les flics
ne se décarcassent pas pour 30 000 $,

translation.en: They damn sure follow up on half a million dollars.
translation.fr:
mais pour un demi-million de dollars,
tu peux parier que si !

translation.en: What do we do?
Nothing.
We divide it up and we sit on it...
translation.fr: On se le partage et on n'y touche pas

translation.en: until we can come up with a way to get rid of it quietly.
translation.fr:
en attendant de trouver
comment s'en débarrasser discrètement.

translation.en: Without looking like, you know...
-Criminals. -[Ruby] Yeah.
What is this?
Turbo S. You know, it's similar to the model that douche-face Nancy has.
translation.fr:
Une Turbo S. Le même modèle
que cette tête de cul de Nancy.

translation.en: But more features, more cylinders. You know, more cooler.
translation.fr:
Mais j'ai pris plus d'options,
plus de puissance. Bref, elle est mieux.

translation.en: Why don't you check under your seat?
Who are you? Oprah?
You get a laptop, and you get a laptop, and you get a laptop!
translation.fr:
Un ordinateur
pour toi, pour toi et pour toi !

translation.en: I don't get it.
Uh, how to have fun? Yes, I can see that.
translation.fr: Comment t'amuser ? Oui, je vois ça.

translation.en: No. How you have money for all this.
translation.fr: Non. D'où tu tires l'argent pour payer ça.

translation.en: Would you just let me worry about that?
-But-- -Who is the adult here?
-Mom. -Who is the adult?
Who's the adult?
Come on, let's go tailgate some old people.
translation.fr:
Viens, on va faire des queues de poisson
à des petits vieux.

translation.en: Hey, Mrs. Boland, nice weather we're having.
translation.fr: Mme Boland. Il fait beau, non ?

translation.en: Afternoon, Mrs. Boland.
I'm gonna have to call you back.
Uh, Mrs. Boland, hi. What are you doing here?
I'm here to clean up a mess, Amber.
translation.fr: Je viens corriger une erreur, Amber.

translation.en: What mess?
You. Sit.
Don't worry. I mostly blame him.
translation.fr:
Ne vous inquiétez pas.
C'est surtout à lui que j'en veux.

translation.en: He should know better. You're obviously stupid.
translation.fr:
Il aurait dû avoir plus de jugeote.
Vous êtes juste bête.

translation.en: Oh, it's not a knock. We all have our strengths and weaknesses.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas méchant.
Chacun a ses forces et ses faiblesses.

translation.en: You're a beautiful dummy. It doesn't make you a bad person.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes une jolie potiche.
Ça n'enlève rien à votre valeur.

translation.en: So... here's what's going to happen.
translation.fr: Voilà ce qui va se passer.

translation.en: You're going to quit your job and my husband, effective immediately.
translation.fr:
Vous allez quitter votre boulot
et mon mari, immédiatement.

translation.en: Trust me, they're both a dead end.
translation.fr:
Croyez-moi,
les deux ne vous mèneront à rien.

translation.en: This is five grand.
Enough for a plane ticket and a little to get you started in LA.
translation.fr:
Assez pour acheter un billet d'avion
et vous installer à LA.

translation.en: I do wanna warn you about something, though.
What's that?
Those folks out there, they take one look at a person like you...
translation.fr:
Les requins de LA,
dès qu'ils voient une fille comme vous...

translation.en: The pretty, the dumb, the self-hating,
translation.fr: Jolie, idiote, aucune estime de soi.

translation.en: and they figure... perfect for porn.
translation.fr: Ils se disent : "Parfaite pour du porno."

translation.en: Mrs. Boland?
Why are you doing this?
Because we both deserve more than a liar in a pig suit.
translation.fr:
Parce qu'on mérite mieux
qu'un menteur déguisé en cochon.

translation.en: Me more than you, but still.
translation.fr: Moi plus que vous, mais quand même.

translation.en: That's the nicest thing that anyone's ever said to me.
translation.fr:
C'est le truc le plus gentil
qu'on ne m'ait jamais dit.

translation.en: Really?
Uh, Mr. Boland?
Doctor, I know you're busy and I won't waste your time.
translation.fr:
Je sais que vous avez du travail,
je serai brève.

translation.en: But I've been doing a lot of research here on different drugs and things.
translation.fr:
Je me suis beaucoup renseignée
sur les divers médicaments.

translation.en: Um, it has this crazy-ass name.
translation.fr: Il a un nom à coucher dehors.

translation.en: Um, but I know it's all out of pocket.
translation.fr: Je sais que je dois payer de ma poche.

translation.en: You're touching me.
Why are you touching me?
Because you've been here for ten minutes and you've barely taken a breath.
translation.fr:
Vous parlez depuis dix minutes
sans reprendre votre souffle.

translation.en: The new med's a great option.
Definitely worth trying before we go down the transplant road.
translation.fr:
Ça vaut le coup d'essayer
avant d'envisager une greffe.

translation.en: I've got samples.
We'll start her on it and see how she does.
translation.fr: Je lui en prescris, on verra le résultat.

translation.en: In the meantime, let's do a CT, creatinine clearance and an ultrasound.
translation.fr:
En attendant, faisons une échographie,
une clairance de créatinine et un scanner.

translation.en: Cover all bases.
Mom.
-Can we get some water in here, please? -[man] Yes, of course.
translation.fr:
- Vous pouvez nous apporter de l'eau ?
- Bien sûr.

translation.en: Oh, is cucumber-infused okay?
[crying] Oh, my God, yes.
-[chuckles] -Can I get lemon, too?
translation.fr: Je peux aussi en avoir au citron ?

translation.en: Annie Bananie.
You forgot your paycheck. Lot of money in here. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Tu as oublié ta paie.
Ça en fait, de l'argent.

translation.en: Thanks.
Hey, how did you have the balls to do it?
translation.fr: Comment vous avez eu le cran de faire ça ?

translation.en: You and the girls get all get coked up or something beforehand?
translation.fr:
Toi et tes copines,
vous avez sniffé de la coke, avant ?

translation.en: What?
I saw your ass tat.
I don't know what you're talking--
translation.fr: Je sais pas de quoi tu parles.

translation.en: How many chicks have a tramp stamp that says, "All You Need Is Love"?
translation.fr:
Combien de nanas se font tatouer
"All You Need Is Love" sur le cul ?

translation.en: It's a very popular song.
Well, then, uh, I guess you won't mind if I go to the cops then, right?
translation.fr:
Dans ce cas, ça ne te dérangera pas
que je prévienne les flics ?

translation.en: If it wasn't you, I'm sure you got some explanation
translation.fr:
Si ce n'était pas toi,
tu dois pouvoir expliquer

translation.en: for how you bought all this on minimum wage.
translation.fr:
comment tu as acheté tout ça
avec ton salaire de misère.

translation.en: [grunts] I didn't say nothing.
Cops came, but I didn't tell them.
translation.fr:
Les flics sont venus,
mais je n'ai pas cafté.

translation.en: What do you want? [shuddering] You want money?
It's not like that.
What's it like, then?
I got your back. I'm gonna keep my mouth shut.
translation.fr: Je suis de ton côté. Je vais la fermer.

translation.en: Thanks.
I mean, I'm really gonna try.
I am. I hope I can. [inhales deeply]
I don't know. I just get so lonely.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Je me sens si seul.

translation.en: Well... [chuckles] I'm sorry to be crass here, but, uh...
translation.fr: Et, au risque de paraître vulgaire,

translation.en: horny, too.
I just wanna shoot my mouth off.
Talk and talk till I'm, um...
satisfied.
-Can we just get it over with? Okay? -Oh, but, hey, hey.
I'm not some "Wham! Bam! Thank you, ma'am."
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas juste tirer mon coup.

translation.en: You know? I need a little romance.
Mom?
Hi, honey. I thought you were asleep.
translation.fr: Ma chérie. Je croyais que tu dormais.

translation.en: And here it is. Found it.
He lost some change in the couch, so I was just helping him find it.
translation.fr:
Il avait perdu des pièces dans le canapé,
je l'aidais à les retrouver.

translation.en: -Thanks. -Yeah, no problem.
Oh, Sadie, honey, this is my, uh... Boomer.
translation.fr: Sadie, je te présente mon... Boomer.

translation.en: I work with him at work. [chuckles]
You know, so... But he has to go now, because he was... He has to...
translation.fr:
Mais il doit y aller, maintenant,
parce qu'il doit...

translation.en: I have to use the quarters on the vending machines.
translation.fr:
Je dois dépenser ces sous
à la machine à café.

translation.en: I was going to maybe fill a meter or two, to surprise someone.
translation.fr:
Ou remplir un parcmètre,
pour faire une surprise au suivant.

translation.en: -Hey, that's nice. -Yeah. Pay it forward or whatever.
Just go.
[Boomer] You know, uh...
since I have all this bus fare now,
translation.fr:
vu que j'ai de l'argent
pour le bus, maintenant,

translation.en: I'll probably be back soon.
Good morning.
I'm gonna need the PINs and passcodes to the accounts.
translation.fr:
J'ai besoin des codes
et des mots de passe des comptes.

translation.en: Mortgage, bank, credit cards.
Uh, it's 2 Fast 2 Furious.
It's the number two, like the movie.
translation.fr: Avec le chiffre 2, comme le film.

translation.en: I know it's a movie.
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est un film.

translation.en: That's for all of them?
I handled the mortgage.
[stutters] How did you do that?
I handled it because you couldn't.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai fait
parce que tu n'en étais pas capable.

translation.en: And this thing that we do...
where you bring home the bacon and I don't ask any questions?
translation.fr:
où tu mets le pain sur la table,
et je ne pose pas de question ?

translation.en: That's over.
Does that mean we get to stay in the house?
translation.fr: On peut rester dans la maison, alors ?

translation.en: It means I get to stay in the house with the kids.
translation.fr:
Je peux rester dans la maison
avec les enfants.

translation.en: You get to go to a motel.
translation.fr: Toi, tu peux te trouver un motel.

translation.en: Your clothes are in the car.
translation.fr: Tes habits sont dans le coffre.

translation.en: Still no leads on last week's armed robbery of Fine & Frugal.
translation.fr:
Une semaine plus tard, aucune piste
pour le braquage du supermarché.

translation.en: A rep from the local...
You don't think it's weird?
translation.fr: Tu ne trouves pas ça bizarre ?

translation.en: What?
Our GoFundMe page has been up for years.
translation.fr:
Ça fait des années
qu'on a créé une page de soutien.

translation.en: Some anonymous donor rolls in now with all that cash?
translation.fr:
Et maintenant,
un donneur anonyme nous offre tout ça ?

translation.en: [Ruby] It's a miracle.
Why question it?
See this?
I do.
Our girl's coming back.
[chuckles] Hey... Okay, bruiser. All right, ease up on 'em. You got him.
translation.fr:
Ça suffit, petite brute.
Du calme. Tu l'as eu.

translation.en: -[Sara grunts] -[Stan] Look at you.
Hey, buddy. What's wrong?
translation.fr:
Coucou, mon grand.
Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas ?

translation.en: You need to go potty? You need to peepee?
Nah, he's good.
We already took him out.
What do you want?
Oh, relax, sweetheart.
I just need you to call your lady friends over
translation.fr: Dis juste à tes copines de venir

translation.en: so we can all have... a little talk.
About what?
Oh, about the money you stole from us.
translation.fr: De l'argent que vous nous avez volé.

translation.en: Yo, this backsplash is dope.
Hey, what's it made out of? Marble?
Yo, you ever get any problems with staining back here?
translation.fr: Ça pose pas de problèmes avec les taches ?

translation.en: Like, if you're cooking a big pot of spaghetti sauce
translation.fr: Genre, si tu cuisines de la sauce tomate

translation.en: or something like that?
No, I don't think so.
No? [chuckles]
We didn't know you owned the store.
translation.fr:
On ne savait pas
que le magasin vous appartenait.

translation.en: I look like some kind of grocery store manager to you?
translation.fr: J'ai l'air d'un gérant de supermarché ?

translation.en: Or, like, Rotary club or something?
translation.fr: Ou d'un membre du Rotary Club ?

translation.en: No, let's just say that we got certain arrangements
translation.fr: Non, disons qu'on a des arrangements

translation.en: with some local businesses.
And we help each other out and whatnot. You know?
translation.fr:
On s'entraide,
c'est un échange de services.

translation.en: Like... money laundering for drugs? I told you it was shady.
translation.fr:
Comme blanchir de l'argent de la drogue.
Je savais que c'était de l'argent sale.

translation.en: Why don't you stop worrying about my business dealings
translation.fr: Vous en faites pas pour mes affaires,

translation.en: and start figuring how you're gonna pay me my money back.
-We can get it back. -Oh, that would be great.
translation.fr:
- On peut vous rembourser.
- Ce serait super.

translation.en: Most of it.
Sorry, what?
[Annie stammers] Some of it, for sure.
[sighs] Oh, what, like you guys didn't spend a dime?
How much, Annie?
I don't know. I probably spent, like, a hundred... grand.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Peut-être cent... mille.

translation.en: [both] What?
I'm gonna shoot you myself.
Nah, you're just gonna pay me back is all.
translation.fr:
Non, vous allez
me rembourser intégralement.

translation.en: I mean, right quick, too. With interest.
So, we'll see you real soon, yeah?
You've really got to be careful, ladies.
I mean, with citrus on marble, like lemon and whatnot.
translation.fr:
Avec l'acidité sur le marbre,
comme du citron, par exemple.

translation.en: That stuff will erode like crazy.
translation.fr: C'est fou comme ça s'érode vite.

translation.en: [Kenny] Why can't Daddy come home?
translation.fr: Pourquoi papa ne rentre pas à la maison ?

translation.en: Your daddy and I love you so much. And I know it's confusing.
translation.fr:
Votre père et moi vous aimons beaucoup.
Je sais que c'est perturbant.

translation.en: Daddy's gotta stay here while he and I work on some grown-up stuff.
translation.fr:
Papa habite ici le temps de régler
des problèmes d'adultes.

translation.en: You can have whatever candy you want -from the vending machines, okay? -[kids] Yay!
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez acheter des bonbons
aux distributeurs.

translation.en: -Hey. -Pick the kids up from school
and bring them straight back here. Don't go to the park or anywhere.
translation.fr:
et ramène-les directement ici.
N'allez pas au parc.

translation.en: I can't have the kids here. I've got, like, one twin bed.
translation.fr:
Je ne peux pas les garder.
Je n'ai qu'un lit.

translation.en: You just have to.
What's going on?
I can't tell you.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas te le dire.

translation.en: Wait. Uh, stop. Are you okay?
Just take care of my babies.
Hey, who wants, uh... Who wants pizza?
-[Kenny] I do! -[kids cheer]
I would have picked you up down the block, but your cell was off.
translation.fr:
Je voulais me garer plus loin,
mais pas moyen de te joindre.

translation.en: [Sadie] Where's the Porsche?
I sold it. I had to.
Is that a cassette deck?
What?
And manual roll-down windows?
translation.fr: Et il faut baisser les vitres à la main ?

translation.en: Yas, Queen.
Mmm-hmm. Cloth interior. Nice. Leather burns your ass.
translation.fr:
J'aime bien les sièges en tissu.
Le cuir, ça brûle le cul.

translation.en: How did you get to be so awesome?
Don't ride in Porsches.
translation.fr: En ne roulant pas en Porsche.

translation.en: [Ruby] Who is it?
I said, who is it?
-[Stan] Me. -[sighs]
Stan.
[laughs] What the hell are you doing?
I want an alarm system. And can you please fix the back gate?
translation.fr:
Je veux une alarme.
Et tu peux réparer le portail du jardin ?

translation.en: I said I would.
You said it, but it just sits there, wide open.
translation.fr:
Tu me l'as promis,
mais il reste grand ouvert.

translation.en: Got your bat out.
You could've gotten the knife out of the drawer, baby.
translation.fr:
Tu aurais pu prendre un couteau
dans le tiroir.

translation.en: All right. I'm sorry.
-I'm sorry. Calm down. I'm sorry. -[groans] God.
You scared? Your heart's beating. Come here. Breathe. Breathe.
translation.fr:
Tu as peur ? Tu as le cœur qui bat.
Viens là. Respire.

translation.en: What did I tell you?
All this right here is all the security you need, baby.
translation.fr: Avec moi, pas besoin de sécurité.

translation.en: -You don't need no Wiffle bat. -Hmm. Is that so?
translation.fr:
- Pas besoin de batte en plastique.
- Vraiment ?

translation.en: Yeah, that's so, because your man here, you know...
is no longer gonna be trailing teenagers at the Great Steak & Fry.
translation.fr:
ne va plus surveiller les ados
dans un fast-food pourri.

translation.en: -You applied to the police academy? -I did.
translation.fr:
- Tu as postulé pour devenir policier ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Yeah. I didn't tell you in case I got rejected.
translation.fr:
Je ne t'avais rien dit,
au cas où je serais rejeté.

translation.en: Brother ain't get rejected.
Oh. Detroit's finest, baby. Protect and serve.
translation.fr:
Gardien de la paix, bébé.
Au service de la population.

translation.en: Give me some.
-[Beth] Where are we at? -[Ruby] Short.
[Beth] By how much?
[Ruby] Over sixty grand.
-[sighs] -What about the car?
I took it back. Lost over half its value, B-T-dubs.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai revendue.
Elle avait perdu la moitié de sa valeur.

translation.en: Well, maybe you shouldn't have bought it in the first place.
My, what a helpful contribution. Let me just grab my time machine.
translation.fr:
Merci pour cette contribution.
Je remonte le temps pour changer ça.

translation.en: Oh, my God. We should just go to the police.
[Annie] Wait. What?
[Ruby] We haven't done anything that bad yet. We don't have records.
translation.fr:
On n'a rien fait de si grave.
On n'a pas de casier judiciaire.

translation.en: [Annie] Uh, yes. Now we do.
[Ruby] If we just explain to them that--
Explain what, that we meant well?
translation.fr: Quoi, qu'on ne pensait pas à mal ?

translation.en: Gee, Officer, we're sorry. We didn't mean to piss off the gang.
translation.fr:
Flûte, monsieur l'agent, désolées.
On ne voulait pas énerver un gang.

translation.en: -We just wanted to rob the grocery store. -Okay, I'm just trying not to die, okay?
translation.fr:
On voulait juste
braquer le supermarché. J'essaie de ne pas mourir, vu ?
Si t'as une meilleure idée...

translation.en: -If you have a better plan-- -Actually, yes, I do.
translation.fr:
J'essaie de ne pas mourir, vu ?
Si t'as une meilleure idée... J'en ai une, oui.

translation.en: We should take it from somewhere else.
We'll just steal it and then we'll pay them back
translation.fr: On le vole, on rembourse le gang

translation.en: and then we'll just put the whole thing to bed.
translation.fr: et on oublie toute cette histoire.

translation.en: Bitch, are you out of your mind?
-It's the best possible plan! -[Beth] Enough!
translation.fr:
- C'est la meilleure option !
- Ça suffit !

translation.en: Enough!
Enough.
We're gonna get that money. We're gonna figure it out.
translation.fr: On va trouver l'argent. On va s'en sortir.

translation.en: Because we are strong and resourceful.
translation.fr: Parce qu'on est fortes et débrouillardes.

translation.en: And we've accomplished way harder than this.
translation.fr:
Et qu'on est capables
de trucs bien plus difficiles.

translation.en: I once made 300 cupcakes in one night,
translation.fr:
Une fois,
j'ai fait 300 cupcakes en une nuit,

translation.en: and they were nut and gluten-free.
The kid still had an allergy attack.
translation.fr:
Le môme a fait une crise d'allergie
quand même.

translation.en: And you don't always have to fact-check me, okay?
translation.fr: Arrête de me reprendre sans arrêt !

translation.en: I'm gonna take a shower.
I smell like booze and crime.
translation.fr: Je pue l'alcool et le crime.

translation.en: [Ruby] Call you tomorrow.
-[sighs] Boomer, I, uh... -Oh? Bad time?
Very.
Hey, come on. Don't be rude.
Oh, God. Boomer, you're wasted.
You know, I was just thinking about how we didn't finish what we started.
translation.fr: On n'a pas fini ce qu'on avait commencé.

translation.en: -Boomer, it's not... Stop. Stop. -[chuckles] What?
Why don't we just have a little bit of fun?
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas t'amuser un peu ?

translation.en: My sister is here.
[pants] Yeah? Is she hot?
I'll be fast, I promise.
-Did you just hit me? -[panting]
You're hurting me!
That's how you like it, right, tough girl? Come on. You can rob a store, right?
translation.fr:
T'aimes ça, non ?
T'es une dure à cuire ! Une braqueuse !

translation.en: Get off of her!
-Whoa! Hey, hey, hey. Hey, easy. -[crying]
All right, no need to get upset.
All right? No need to get upset.
translation.fr: D'accord ? Pas la peine de s'énerver.

translation.en: Oh, do I look upset? Why would I be upset?
translation.fr:
J'ai l'air d'être énervée ?
Pourquoi je serais énervée ?

translation.en: Because every man in the world thinks
translation.fr: Parce que les hommes pensent tous

translation.en: he can do whatever he wants whenever he wants?
translation.fr:
qu'ils peuvent faire
ce qu'ils veulent de nous ?

translation.en: Okay, okay. Hey, we were just having a little bit of fun. All right?
Oh, was that what that was? Because you see...
when a lady screams "stop,"
translation.fr: quand une femme te crie d'arrêter,

translation.en: it is usually because she is not having the time of her life.
translation.fr:
en général,
c'est signe qu'elle ne s'éclate pas.

translation.en: But what do I know?
Now, you're gonna pull up your pants
and you are gonna get the hell out of here.
Get out!
Is that a...
toy gun?
[sighs] Yeah, it is.
No, it's not.
Okay, then...
shoot me, hmm?
You stupid bitches.
You're going down.
Boomer! Boomer! Please! You need money? We'll get you money.
translation.fr: Boomer ! Pitié ! Tu veux de l'argent ?

translation.en: -Oh, no, I'm turning you in. -Boomer, please. Please.
translation.fr:
- Non, je vais vous dénoncer.
- Pitié.

translation.en: You know how fast they're gonna lock you up
translation.fr: Les flics seront ravis de te coffrer

translation.en: -and take away your loser kid? -No, Boomer. Please.
translation.fr: et de te retirer ta conne de fille.

translation.en: Yeah, your dumbass sister, too. The two of you are so done.
translation.fr:
Ta pétasse de sœur aussi.
C'est fini, pour vous deux.

translation.en: You're gonna rot in jail.
Yeah, you think you're so much better than everyone.
Well, now you are finished. It is over.
No, please! [screams]
-Oh, my God! -[groans]
You...
Is he...
He's not.
Are you sure?
No.
[sighs] What do we do now?
We're not going to the police.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas appeler la police.
